title: Creates a MS Word report of moose twinning
text: R package imports moose twinning data, estimates twinning rates, generates plots summary tables, produces survey report. Originally developed Tetlin National Wildlife Refuge’s moose twinning survey, adopted similar surveys. Generates report follows AK Refuge Report Series template.

title: Creates a MS Word report of moose twinning
text: use twinning generate reports, ’ll need: R version >4.0 Available FWS Apps--Go Rtools version >4.0 Available FWS Apps--Go version RStudio includes Quarto install load twinning R package:
code: if (!require("devtools")) install.packages("devtools")   devtools::install_github("USFWS/twinning", ref = "main", build_vignettes = TRUE)    library(twinning)
